text: Ia datɨrɨghɨn Isipɨn ikia, egha ia uan dafaribar asebar marvir guabar ingara, ofan mɨgharir mughuriar aghuim zuiba, aser igharagha garibagh anɨdi. Ezɨ ian arazir kam na gamima, kɨ bar puvɨram anɨngaghe. Eghtɨ kamaghɨn ia ikuvigham. Eghtɨ Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamiziba bar ia dɨpova, akar asuir kurabar ia mɨkɨmam. Egh me uan apaniba akar kurabar me mɨkɨmsɨ, me kamaghɨn mɨkɨmam, ‘Ia Judaba ikuvizɨ moghɨn ia ikuvigham.’
